sentences.en: The atavism appears in the crisscross inheritance as well as in the other genetic way.
sentences.cn: 隔代遗传既出现在交叉遗传当中,也出现在其它遗传当中.

sentences.en: They are explainable as a species of mental atavism.
sentences.cn: 这些都可以解释为一种精神的返祖现象.

sentences.en: Together we developed the theory that cancer tumours are a type of atavism that appears in the adult form when something disrupts the silencing of ancestral genes.
sentences.cn: 我们合作发展了肿瘤细胞是一种返祖现象这个理论，当远古基因的沉寂被扰乱时，返祖现象就会出现在成体型中。

words.tran_cn: 隔代遗传的；返祖现象的
显隔代遗传物；呈现返祖性之动物或植物

trans.tran_en: the recurrence in a plant or animal of certain primitive characteristics that were present in an ancestor but have not occurred in intermediate generations
